parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post mentions PSD Constanta and implicitly refers to Marcel Ciolacu,  although not by name,  as the leader of the PSD. The image also clearly shows several PSD members.  It also mentions other parties (PNL, AUR, USR) in a comparative manner.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide audience in Constanta County,  as indicated by the ad data. The content is not a private message but is intended for public consumption.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post aims to negatively portray the PSD Constanta branch's handling of their presidential candidate, implicitly suggesting a lack of support.  The visual contrast between the PSD and the other parties (PNL, AUR, USR) further reinforces a comparative electoral message. The headline "Noul PSD PNL AUR USR OPRIT!" clearly positions PSD against a coalition of other parties, influencing voters' choices.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The language used ("îngropat," "bravo," etc.) is highly opinionated and clearly intended to sway public opinion rather than inform impartially.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion; it actively promotes a negative view of a specific party and its actions, with the clear intention of influencing voters' choices in the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1106803711113491</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by "Surse Interne,"  meets the criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015. It directly refers to a political party (PSD) participating in the parliamentary elections, targets a wide audience in Constanta County, and has a clear electoral objective: to negatively influence voters' perception of the PSD and potentially benefit other parties by comparison. The post's language and imagery are not neutral; they are designed to evoke strong emotions and sway public opinion.  The timing of the post, after the official campaign period, further strengthens the case for a violation.  While the post doesn't explicitly endorse or discourage voting for a specific candidate, its negative portrayal of the PSD and its implied support for other parties constitutes electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Marcel Ciolacu</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Surse Interne</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Surse Interne, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1106803711113491) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care conține propagandă electorală negativă împotriva PSD, prin utilizarea unor termeni precum „îngropat” și prin contrastarea vizuală a PSD cu alte partide (PNL, AUR, USR), având ca efect electoral influențarea negativă a voturilor pentru PSD în favoarea altor partide, fapt ce se încadrează în definiția materialului de propagandă electorală din Art 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  Postarea, vizibilă pe o platformă publică și plătită, se adresează publicului larg din județul Constanța, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
